description: The super supernova, Trafalgar Law is now available in Pop form!
The captain of the 7th Company is here to take home with you today!
The son of the legendary Hokage is finally ready to take the stage! Grab yours today!
The #1 villain of all time, jumps forward with his String-String fruit! Pre-order is now available!
The legendary hokage appears before us, finally in Pop form!
Father of Naruto, Minato drops into the store for Pre-order!
The most splendid ninja in all of the Hidden Leaf, check out Rock Lee today!
The cursed golden boy, the dark crusader, Yuji Itadori is finally in stock in his rare Pop form!
Trafalgar Law is in store, and he’s ready to bring everyone to shambles!
The smiling demon of the clover kingdom is ready to shock and electrify! Pick up your Luck today!
The king of the pirates is finally in stock after a long awaited delay! Grabs yours as soon as possible!
The king of the slimes, and the land almost is finally here to take home! Don’t miss out!
